snippet: The founder and artistic director of Introdans, a troupe from eastern Netherlands, look back at the company’s history on the eve of its United States debut on Tuesday.
abstract: Introdans founder Roel Voorintholt and artistic director Ton Wiggers look back at the dance company’s 40-year history on the eve of its United States debut.
lead_paragraph: The founder and artistic director of Introdans, a troupe from eastern Netherlands, look back at the company’s history on the eve of its United States debut on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Introdans Dance Troupe’s Long Road to the Joyce Theater
headline.main: Dutch Troupe’s Long Road to the Joyce
headline.print_headline: Dutch Troupe’s Long Road to the Joyce
